mapper.select: select r.rest_id, r.rest_name, rv.review_id, u.user_id, u.alias, rv.content from restaurant r left join review rv on r.rest_id = rv.rest_id left join `user` u on rv.user_id = u.user_id and u.user_id is not null where content is not null order by r.rest_id asc;

select row_number() over(order by r.rest_id asc) `rank`, r.rest_id, r.rest_name, count(rv.rest_id) rest_amount, round(avg(rv.rating), 1) rating, rv.img from review rv left join restaurant r on rv.rest_id = r.rest_id GROUP BY r.rest_id limit 3
